title: 8 bed 6 bath Large House on 52p land for Sale – Thalawathugoda
details:
Large House in a beautiful location with rear facing nature & greenery.

• 8 Large Rooms
• 6 Bathrooms
• 6,500sqft total floor space
• 52 perch land
• Large landscaped garden
• Full length tennis court with flood lights
• Rear garden opening up to a serene natural greenery
• Visitors Toilet
• Separate dining, sitting, entertainment, washing ironing areas
• Pantry and separate kitchen
• Shrine room
• Solar hot water
• Generator Electric Circuit installed
• Centrally wired TV and Telephone System
• Emergency Lighting System
• Separate Servants quarters & toilets
• Separate driver’s quarters
• Separate Annex with 2 bedrooms & toilets
• Ample parking
• Tall Gate and Tall boundary wall around the house
• Electric Gate
• And many more extras
• Clear deeds

Rs.100 million
